title: Changed my name
body:
I changed my name to Unceasing but my old name is lingering (not ingame or in the client but on Boards, Forum, etc), is there a way to fix this?

EDIT: can't comment on Boards posts either because "I'm not level 7 or higher yet" and trying to access my Boards profile gives me a 404

EDIT 2: Ok. I looked some stuff up and turns out posting this fixed it, I can reply, and everything is fine - except the top right corner still says my old name (The Only Voling) and going to my Boards Profile fixed it. Changing the URL to Unceasing instead of The Only Voling lets me go there but I'm sure the system will resolve that.

replies.body: Everything looks up to date right now!  Sometimes yoru account will need to sync to the boards, and it looks like your thread did just that.  Let me know if you have any issues posting!
